p: The coefficient of determination, R 2, which corresponds to the percentage of the variance of the observed time-series that is explained by the model, was calculated. Root-mean-square error (RMSE) was calculated using real values and predicted values for influenza activities in the validation set from the 41 th week in 2015 to 14 th week in 2019. The onset of influenza weeks for ILI is defined as the weighted percentage that exceeds the national baseline [ 28]. The peak amplitude and the peak timing are defined as the maximum value and that week in seasonal influenza week.
